summary: Client asked Sarah to start a requirements meeting; the PM asked what the project should be called. QA, Architect, and Developer did not provide input (not addressed).

actions.task: Start the requirements meeting and propose a project name

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (QA, Architect, Developer) did not provide input / were not addressed
risks.mitigation: Follow up to engage QA, Architect, and Developers, circulate the meeting agenda and questions in advance, and schedule time in the meeting to capture their requirements and confirm project name.
